testcase.classname: Test paygrades functionality in user management
testcase.name: Verify adding pay grades and currency fuctionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on homepage...............................................passed And clicks on "Admin" in sidepanel..........................................passed Then User Management section is displayed...................................passed When Admin clicks on job dropdown...........................................passed And selects "Pay Grades" in the dropdown....................................passed Then "Pay Grades" screen is displayed.......................................passed When Admin clicks on Add button.............................................passed Then "Add Pay Grade" page is displayed......................................passed And Admin enters Grade 12...................................................passed And Clicks on save button...................................................passed And The "Edit Pay Grade" page is displayed successfully.....................passed Then "Add Currency" section shows up........................................passed And Admin adds parameters in add currency section INR - Indian Rupee,10000.00 and 25000.00.passed And Clicks on save button for add currency..................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed And currency created with parameters Indian Rupee, 10000.00 and 25000.00 are added to the table.passed When Admin clicks on cancel button..........................................passed Then Added paygrade with Grade 12 and Indian Rupee gets listed in pay grade table.passed
